channel.title: Lisse - Trey [Jazz, FB]
channel.description:
I’m very new to this kind of music, so I’m sure the genre is not accurate.
https://soundcloud.com/treyauxy/lisse I’ve been listening to more jazzy type music lately and was inspired to make something a little different than what most of the stuff I hear coming out of Auxy is. I’ve learned lately, especially in this song, that chromatic mode is your friend when writing chord progressions. Hopefully you all enjoy and feed back is appreciated. The name means ‘smooth’ in French. ![image|500x500](upload://57gLhWDIMKc9R1eRfj1iP5wRGfr.jpeg)

item.title: Lisse - Trey [Jazz, FB]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
Thank you! I’m glad you like it, and hopefully they’ll see it before the next set!

item.title: Lisse - Trey [Jazz, FB]
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
Very nice and chill track. Beautiful chords and melody! Love the transition from Jazz to Future Bass! Really well done! I feel as the snare at the drop wasn’t very loud, or loud enough.

Versatility: 9/10
Creativity: 9/10
Predictability: 8/10
Use Of Instruments/Automation: 7/10
Feeling: 9/10

Overall: 42/50 Nice

Read full topic

item.title: Lisse - Trey [Jazz, FB]
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
I’m very new to this kind of music, so I’m sure the genre is not accurate.

https://soundcloud.com/treyauxy/lisse
I’ve been listening to more jazzy type music lately and was inspired to make something a little different than what most of the stuff I hear coming out of Auxy is. I’ve learned lately, especially in this song, that chromatic mode is your friend when writing chord progressions. Hopefully you all enjoy and feed back is appreciated.
The name means ‘smooth’ in French.
